author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HENRIETTE WEAKENS SLIGHTLY FAR TO THE EAST OF HAWAII...
summary: ...HENRIETTE WEAKENS SLIGHTLY FAR TO THE EAST OF HAWAII... As of 5:00 PM HST Thu Aug 07 the center of Henriette was located near 19.1, -138.4 with movement W at 16 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...HENRIETTE WEAKENS SLIGHTLY FAR TO THE EAST OF HAWAII... As of 5:00 PM HST Thu Aug 07 the center of Henriette was located near 19.1, -138.4 with movement W at 16 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Henriette (EP3/EP082025)
